title: On the crystal limit of the q-difference sixth Painlev\'e equation
abstract:
We consider the Riemann-Hilbert correspondence associated with the
$q$-difference sixth Painlev\'e equation in the crystal limit, i.e.
$q\rightarrow 0$, and show two main results. First, the limit of this
generically highly transcendental mapping is shown to exist. Second, we show
that the limiting map is bi-rational and describe it explicitly.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
